message: Dears . Any one tried to use microsoft word in Web site instead of using rich text editor .

data.message: I can't relate to your question, could you elaborate please?
i need to allow word document to be opened in asp.net web Page so the user can write and modify his document , the same like Online word .

ahaa, ok,  just to make sure you get a good help, let us know what are your search results, what did you try and what is your current status, just to make sure you won't get the same trials you already did and failed.

and is embeding the file in your page like so : 
http://en.support.wordpress.com/word-web-app/
could help you?
Great but i need to host the file inside my organization for example in share point Server  or something like that , not in external data source
ok, let us know how far did you get to push you forward from there.
Sharepoint should allow you to edit word files in it

INMO; It can be down by using Word Online Service which is part of the Office Services deployed along with the SharePoint (Server/Online) BUT if you're targeting Office 365 tenant. you can use Office 365 API to manage user's document, mailboxes, etc..
